org.wso2.carbon.identity.openidconnect.dao

Class CacheBackedScopeClaimMappingDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.openidconnect.dao.ScopeClaimMappingDAOImpl
      • org.wso2.carbon.identity.openidconnect.dao.CacheBackedScopeClaimMappingDAOImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScopeClaimMappingDAO

    public class CacheBackedScopeClaimMappingDAOImpl
extends ScopeClaimMappingDAOImpl
    Default cache backed implementation of ScopeClaimMappingDAO. This handles OIDCScopeClaimCache related cache layer operations.
